pullrequest.title: Clean up some unnecessary stderr output

content.raw:
Just to make sure I understand, what makes this functionally different from `${CMAKE_COMMAND} --build <BINARY_DIR> --target codecheck`?

Is the `${CMAKE_COMMAND} --build ...` command automatically injecting the `-j<N>` flag which produces the warnings about the job server being unavailable?
content.html:
Just to make sure I understand, what makes this functionally different from ${CMAKE_COMMAND} --build <BINARY_DIR> --target codecheck?

Is the ${CMAKE_COMMAND} --build ... command automatically injecting the -j<N> flag which produces the warnings about the job server being unavailable?
